quest.name: ArmorForDagobert
quest.title: Armor For Dagobert
quest.description: Dagobert, the consultant at the bank of Semos, asked me to find a leather cuirass for him.

hints.entry: I see that you will take a leather cuirass from a dead cyclops.
I see that you will fight some cyclopes living in the dungeon deep under Semos.

quest.name: IntroducePlayers
quest.title: Helping Tad
quest.description: Tad, a boy in Semos Townhall, needs help to get his medicine.

quest.name: Campfire
quest.title: Campfire
quest.description: Sally wants to build a campfire, but she doesn't have any wood.

quest.name: BeerForHayunn
quest.title: Beer for Hayunn
quest.description: Hayunn Naratha, the great warrior in Semso Guard House, wants a beer.

history.entry: I have talked to Hayunn.
I do not want to make Hayunn drunk.
I will give Hayunn one drink.
I have a beer.
I gave the beer to Hayunn. He paid me 20 gold coins and 10 xp.

quest.name: CleanStorageSpace
quest.title: Clean the Storage Space
quest.description: Eonna has a underground storage space filled with rats and snakes. She wants me, a true hero, to clean it out.

history.entry: I have met Eonna at her house
I do not want to clear her storage space of creatures.
I do want to help Eonna kill the rats and snakes.
I have cleaned out Eonna's storage space.
Eonna thanked me and called me her hero.

quest.name: DailyItemQuest
quest.title: Daily Item Quest
quest.description: Mayor Chalmers needs supplies for Ados City.

history.entry: I have met Mayor Chalmers in Ados Townhall
I do not want to help Ados.
I want to help Ados.
I have been asked to fetch an item to help Ados. I haven't got it yet.
I have found the item to help Ados and need to take it.
I fetched the last item the mayor asked me to find and claimed my reward within the last 24 hours.
I fetched the last item the mayor asked me to find and now Ados needs supplies again.

hints.entry: If you want to learn which creatures drop an item look it up on http://stendhalgame.org

quest.name: DailyMonsterQuest
quest.title: Daily Monster Quest
quest.description: Mayor Sakhs needs warriors to keep Semos city safe.

history.entry: I have met Mayor Sakhs in Semos Townhall
I do not want to help Semos.
I want to help Semos.
I have been asked to kill a creature to help Semos. I haven't killed it yet.
I have killed the creature to help Semos.
I killed the last creature the mayor asked me to kill and claimed my reward within the last 24 hours.
I killed the last creature the mayor asked me to kill and now Semos needs my help again.

hints.entry: Starkad knows all about creatures, you can ask him where to find anything you need.

quest.name: FishermansLicenseQuiz
quest.title: Fishermans License Quiz
quest.description: Santiago the fisherman wants to test my knowledge of fish species.

history.entry: I met Santiago in a hut in Ados city. If I pass his quiz I get a fishing license.
I got all the names of the fish right and now I'm a better fisherman!

hints.entry: Libraries have books you can read, and books are a likely place to find famous quotes..

quest.name: HatForMonogenes
quest.title: Hat for Monogenes
quest.description: Monogenes wants a hat to help him keep warm during the winter.

history.entry: I have met Monogenes at the spring in Semos village
I have to find a hat, something leather to keep his head warm.
I have found a hat.
I have given the hat to Monogenes, and he rewarded me 10 xp.

hints.entry: I have heard that Xin Blanca sells helmets, maybe one would make a good hat.

quest.name: HungryJoshua
quest.title: Hungry Joshua
quest.description: Xoderos is worried about his brother Joshua who lives in Ados because they are short of supples.

history.entry: I have asked Xoderos at Semos blacksmith if he has a quest for me.
I do not want to help Xoderos and Joshua.
I agreed to take 5 sandwiches to Joshua and tell him that I have his #food.
I got five sandwiches to take Joshua.
I took the food to Joshua and he asked me to tell his brother Xoderos that he is ok, by saying #Joshua.
I passed the message to Xoderos and he has fixed my keyring for me.

quest.name: KillDarkElves
quest.title: Kill Dark Elves
quest.description: Maerion, leader of Elves, wants to kill dark elves in the secret room and get back his amulet.

quest.name: KillEnemyArmy
quest.title: Kill Enemy Army
quest.description: Despot Halb Errvl asked me to kill several of his enemies.

quest.name: KillSpiders
quest.title: Kill spiders
quest.description: Morgrin, groundskeeper of magic school, want to clear magic school basement from spiders.

history.entry: I do not agree to help Morgrin.
I do agree to help Morgrin.
i have killed spider in basement.
i have killed poisonous spider in basement.
i have killed giant spider in basement.
i have killed all 3 spiders in basement, and going to Morgrin for my reward.
i have killed all spiders in magic shool basement and get mythical egg.

quest.name: LearnAboutKarma
quest.title: Learn About Karma
quest.description: Sarzina will teach about Karma.

history.entry: I have met Sarzina in a hut in Fado and asked about a quest.
Sarzina told me about karma and that I can come back to be reminded of how it works any time.

quest.name: LearnAboutOrbs
quest.title: Learn About Orbs
quest.description: Ilisa will teach about using Orbs.

history.entry: I have met Ilisa in Semos Temple.
Ilisa taught me how to use orbs. I must be careful as they could send me somewhere dangerous.

quest.name: LookBookforCeryl
quest.title: Look for a book for Ceryl
quest.description: Ceryl wants a old book that was checked out.

history.entry: I have met Ceryl at the library, he's the librarian there
I do not want to find the book
I do want the find the black book
I have talked to Jynath, and have the book
I do not have the black book Jynath has
I have returned the book to Ceryl and got 50 gold and 100 xp

quest.name: LookUpQuote
quest.title: Look Up Quote
quest.description: Pequod has forgotten a quote by a famous fisherman.

history.entry: I met Pequod in a hut in Ados city and he asked me to look up a quote by a famous fisherman.
I got the quote for Pequod and he gave me a fishing rod.

hints.entry: Libraries have books you can read, and books are a likely place to find famous quotes..

quest.name: MeetIo
quest.title: Meet Io
quest.description: Io Flotto can teach about how to communicate.

history.entry: I met the telepath Io Flotto in Semos Temple.
Io taught me the six basic elements of telepathy and promised to remind me if I need to refresh my knowledge.

quest.name: ObsidianKnife
quest.title: Obsidian Knife
quest.description: Alrak needs help but maybe he can help me too.

history.entry: I have met Alrak the blacksmith in Wofol.
I do not want to help Alrak.
Alrak asked me to bring him some food. I must say the food name when I return.
I need to ask in a library about a gem_book for Alrak.
I got the gem book Alrak wanted.
Alrak is reading the gem book I brought him.
Alrak says if I kill a black dragon and find a cod and an obsidian he will make me a knife.
I have killed a black dragon.
I have got the cod and obsidian.
I took the cod and obsidian to Alrak. Now he's forging my knife.
I have my obsidian knife! It is awesome!

quest.name: PlinksToy
quest.title: Plinks toy
quest.description: Plink wants me to find his teddy.

history.entry: I have met Plink
I do not want to find Plink's toy bear
I do want to help Plink find his bear
I have found Plink's toy bear
I gave Plink his bear.
Plink commented about the bear I have with me

quest.name: SevenCherubs
quest.title: Seven Cherubs
quest.description: I have to find the seven cherubs about the world.

history.entry: I have started finding the seven cherubs
I met Cherubiel in Semos Village.
I met Cherubiel in Nalwor City.
I met Ophaniel by Orril River.
I met Raphael between Orril River and the bridge to Fado.
I met Uriel on Orril Mountain.
I met Zophiel on Semos Mountain.
I met Azazel by Ados Rock.
Done! I have found every one!

quest.name: SuntanCreamForZara
quest.title: Suntan Cream For Zara
quest.description: Zara is burning under the hot Athor sun.

history.entry: I have met Zara on Athor Island.
I do not want to help Zara. She can burn.
I want to help Zara soothe her skin. I need to get suntan cream from the lifeguards.
I got the suntan cream.
I took the suntan cream to Zara and she let me have a key to her house in Ados City North. She says it is the one at the far end of the lower row.

hints.entry: There are legends of minotaurs living in a labyrinth below Athor Island. They guard the kokuda.
There are rumours of a labyrinth under the east side of Athor Island. Perhaps you can get to it from the underground caves.
There is a dangerous patch of quicksand near lots of snakes and stone creatures.

quest.name: ThePiedPiper
quest.title: The Pied Piper
quest.description: Ados city have a rats problem periodically.

quest.name: VampireSword
quest.title: Vampire Sword
quest.description: Hogart can forge a life stealing sword.

history.entry: I have met Hogart at the dwarf blacksmith.
I do not want to earn the vampire sword
I want the life stealing sword. I need to return to Hogart with a goblet of blood
I took the full goblet to Hogart and now I need to collect 10 iron bars
I took 10 iron and the goblet to Hogart. Now he's forging my sword.
Finally I earned the vampire sword.

hints.entry: There is an entrance to Semos catacombs in the graveyard in semos plains north.
The invisible wall is a puzzle, look around and walk on every thing special looking (mind the spikes, though!)

quest.name: WeeklyItemQuest
quest.title: Weekly Item Quest
quest.description: Hazel wants Kirdneh museum to have the best rarest items.

history.entry: I have met Hazel, the curator of Kirdneh museum.
I do not want to help Kirdneh museum become the greatest in the land.
I want to help Kirdneh museum become the greatest in the land.
I have been asked to find a rare item for Kirdneh museum.
I have the rare item for Kirdneh museum and need to take it.
I took the valuable item to Hazel within the last 7 days.
I took the valuable item to Hazel and the museum can now afford to send me to find another.

hints.entry: If you want to learn which creatures drop an item look it up on http://stendhalgame.org

quest.name: ZooFood
quest.title: Zoo Food
quest.description: The animals at the zoo are hungry! They need some food!

history.entry: I have met Katinka at the zoo
I do not have the time for smelly animals and their food issues
I don't want to see those poor animals die! I'll help get the food!
I have got the food required
The animals are not hungry! Yay, me!
The animals are hungry again! I need to ask Katinka what they need.
